# 解説を参考に作成
a = int(input())
b = int(input())
c = int(input())
d = int(input())
e = int(input())
k = int(input())

if (abs(b - a) > k):
    print(':(')
elif (abs(c - b) > k):
    print(':(')
elif (abs(d - c) > k):
    print(':(')
elif (abs(e - d) > k):
    print(':(')
else:
    print('Yay!')

#!/usr/bin/env python3
# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
n=int(input())
s=input()
a=[0]*n
a[0]=1 if s[0]=="#" else 0
for i in range(1,n):
	a[i]=a[i-1]+1 if s[i]=="#" else 0
ans=n
for i in range(n):
	ans=min(ans,a[i]+n-i-1)
print(ans)

    print(":(")
elif e - b > k:

elif e - d > k:
    print(":(")
else: 
    print("Yay!")
